components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays and Failures to Movicel Network in Angola

incident_updates.body: We continue to experience SMS delivery delays and failures when sending messages to Movicel network in Angola. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Megafon & Yota

incident_updates.body: The Megafon & Yota networks in Russia are conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Megafon & Yota Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Germany and France Voice Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body: Our Voice carrier partner in Germany and France are conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 18:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures to Twilio Germany, and to and from Twilio France phone numbers.

The Beeline network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2024 at 15:00 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 17:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Beeline Russia handsets.

The MTS network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2024 at 21:30 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 22:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to MTS Russia handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Austria, United Kingdom and Italy Account Security Carriers Partners Maintenance - Drei, Three and Wind Tre

incident_updates.body:
Our carriers partners Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy are conducting a planned maintenance from 23 September 2024 at 21:30 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 23:30 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following carriers and countries: Drei Austria, Three United Kingdom and Wind Tre Italy customers.

The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 30 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 03 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
09 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 09 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
11 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 11 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
16 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 16 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
